issue.title: my.uopeople.edu
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://my.uopeople.edu/my/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmy.uopeople.edu%2Fmy%2F) ### Comment > I’ve added the time part of the site which I’ve encircled in picture to be blocked through the AdGuard option in aA menu of iPhone safari from the page and it gets added to user rules in AdGuard app, and it hides from page when I do it, but when I refresh the page or go to another page of this site it shows up again, and I’ve also disabled and enabled AdGuard , cleaned safari data and closed and opened safari browser, deleted user rules and added it again but this issue still remained. Username: `@Grungerock1991` ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/dta3t72m708wo4g848okgcgo0ckkoc0c2taoi7faio.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/s8kneajwfq8gwk0kkgccogw40wsgsgk7p52lv6a62w.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.0 System version: | iOS 15.8 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection
